title: Implicates true horror then follows up with kitsch.
review: As a young parent the accident in the first to second act of the movie was such an horrific event that the emotional impact dwarfed everything that followed and labeled it as silly nonsense. I'm happy that I watched till the end because when the elderly nudist club started showing up and crowned their teenage demon king in the treehouse of horrors all my real life worries where lifted from my shoulders again as I cracked up in disbelieve and praising the movie with extended facial palmisation.
